description:
We are a company based in Italy with focus on high quality UI/UX design products. 

We are looking for UI engineer for full-time collaboration on our projects. 

We will not consider any agency. Only freelancers.

Requirements:
• Back-End development (PHP, WordPress).
• Basic knowledge of *nix systems.
• Advanced Front-End development (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery).
• Understanding of web standards, responsive and accessible interfaces.
• Third-party API integration.
• Strong spoken and written communication skills (english).
• Versioning Control (Git/GitHub).


To apply please provide:
• your LinkedIn account
• your GitHub account 
• your Twitter account
title: UI & WordPress Developer
